org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce

Class LabelExpander

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.LabelExpander

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class LabelExpander
extends Object
    An utility class that helps the mapper and reducers used with visibility to scan the visibility_labels and helps in parsing and expanding the visibility tags
